actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to define the jurisdiction of the Federal courts with respect to challenges to congressional subpoenas.

summary.text: Requires commencement in the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia circuit of any suit in which one party seeks injunctive relief to avoid compliance with a Congressional subpoena. Defines the scope of review and the standards to be considered in such review.

titles.title: A bill to define the jurisdiction of the Federal courts with respect to challenges to congressional subpoenas.
